column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////So excited about returning to Bavette's this sat. night
column2: we love it! The ambiance is so sexy and the food is amazing! I order the same things every time
column3: maybe it's time to branch out
column4: but I'm addicted to that wedge w/ the huge slice of BACON!!! the Chicken is so juicy and flavorful then the grilled broccoli
column5: yummy! The chocolate mouse cake is probably the best desert I have ever had
column6: it is heaven! The only thing I would change is the fact they are always booked
column7: my husband and I never leave without making a reservation. We usually have to wait 90 days
column8: but that's good enough for me
column11: the basement kind of feels like a basement.
